  7. Nimekubali (akiwa na Ray C)

26 Counting Down using Recursion The function count_down in this Python code is supposed to count down to 1 no matter what number you give it. But it never stops - it goes past 1 into the negative numbers.

This code uses recursion
column2: which means it calls itself. To make it stop
column3: at the beginning of the function check: <b>if n is equal to 0
column4: return 0. Otherwise if n is not 0
column5: we want to keep counting down until we get there.	<block type="def" id="`!P-kBpjvK=o
